channel.title: Teamspeak help
channel.description:
Well I lost my old mic,and was on ts with a friend.I had my headphones on so I could hear him,but he can hear all my computer noises (example : msnboxes,songs,and such)
So my question is why? And Is there a way for me to talk to him like this?And how?

item.title: Teamspeak help
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

No its recording your computers output but not the input (cos you got no mic).

Just get a microphone.

Read full topic
